text: Yuugg is an Indian actor, writer and director, who predominantly works in Marathi regional films. Some of his roles are Shiva from Karuna Shiv Shankara, and Sam from Duniya geli Tel Lavat. He is a writer of the Marathi film Youth, starring Vikram Gokhale, Satish Pulekar, and Nehamahajan. His recent film is I am not Slumdog I am Indian which released in August 2016. ==Filmography== ===Films=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Film Name !
